data.title: How to train procedurally generated game-like environments at scale with Amazon SageMaker RL
data.authors: Jonathan Chung, Anna Luo, Sahika Genc
data.description: A gym is a toolkit for developing and comparing reinforcement learning algorithms. Procgen Benchmark is a suite of 16 procedurally-generated gym environments designed to benchmark both sample efficiency and generalization in reinforcement learning.  These environments are associated with the paper Leveraging Procedural Generation to Benchmark Reinforcement Learning (citation).
